title: [BUG] Skiasharp breaks Edit And Continue functionality in Xamarin Forms UWP application
body:
As soon as a <SKCanvasView/> is added in a empty Xamarin Forms UWP Application, Edit And continue does not work any more

**Step to reproduce:**
Create a Mobile App (Xamarin.Forms) project.
Select UWP platform.
Add reference to SkiaSharp Nugets : SkiaSharp 1.68.1.1 SkiaSharp.View.Forms 1.61.1.1
In the Page xaml, add a <forms:SKCanvasView></forms:SKCanvasView>
Select UWP project
Put a breakpoint at first line of App constructor.
Hit F5.
When execution is breaked on breakpoint, add a dummy line of code in App Constructor.
Hit F5 to continue execution.

**Expected Behavior:**
Code change is well applied by "Edit And Continue" feature;
Code execution continues normally.

**Actual Behavior:**
Dialog box appear s: "Edits were made which cannot be compiled; Execution cannot continue unitl compile erros are fixed."
Error panel shows following error : "Failed to emit module 'App6': Changing the version of an assembly reference is not allowed during debugging: 'System.Runtime, Version=4.0.20.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a' changed version to '4.1.2.0'.

**Conditions**
- Version with issue:  1.68.1.1; also reproduced with 1.68.0
- IDE:  Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2019 Version 16.5.3 
- UWP:  Microsoft.NETCore.UniversalWindowsPlatform v6.2.10

Notes : 
If <SKCanvas/> is removed from xaml but references to Skia# nugets kepts, then Edit and continue works again.

comments.body:
Could you tell me if you feel I should post to Xamarin Github instead? 

Not having Edit and continue is a pity, especially when working with "Drawing" where it is common to make dozen of small code change to adjust graphics design. That's why Edit and Continue is essential for me when working with Skia#.
